name: 2015 Ukraine Electric Power Attack ATT&CK Techniques
description: Techniques used during the 2015 Ukraine Electric Power Attack

techniques.comment: Used CVE-2021-44228 to exploit publicly exposed servers for initial access.
Used commands and scripts (like PowerShell and BAT) to execute different operations.
Used NineRAT to set up persistence by creating services using BAT scripts.
NineRAT has a dropper binary containing two other components, written to disk, and the dropper deletes itself to avoid detection.
Used Telegram bots and channels for C2 communications.
Used commands like 'whoami,' 'ver,' 'getmac' for system information discovery.
NineRAT is used to collect data from the local system.
